Franz Schubert

Sonata in C-sharp minor, D 655

1819

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 5'

  • 1.

Schubert began only the first movement of the sonata.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Schubert-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · VII/2/2 · BA 5541 · Klaviersonaten II · ed. Walburga Litschauer
  • Associated Board · Complete Pianoforte Sonatas / Volume II · ed. Howard Ferguson
  • Henle · HN 150 · Klaviersonaten / Band III · ed. Paul Mies
  • Henle · HN 151 · Klaviersonaten / Band III · ed. Paul Mies
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50221 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten / Band 2 · ed. Martino Tirimo

This movement is incomplete.
